item.description:
Comedy night at the Portsmouth Pearl, Sat. 13 at 8 pm starring national headliner and Las Vegas regular Jim Lauletta (HBO, Comedy Central, Showtime, NBC) along with Boston favorite Mike Prior (Comedy Central, MTV). Tickets are $15 but if we put together a group of ten or more we receive a 20% discount. The $15 tickets are $12 which is great price to see Lauletta.
A Meet Up group in Fall River saw him last night... about 20 Meet Up group members had a great time.
Please contact me if you are interested and I will set it up and get great seating.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: LAS VEGAS COMEDY NIGHT AT THE PORTSMOUTH PEARL, OCT. 13
